item.name: Mystery Seed
item.description: Plant any time. Takes 10 days to mature. Yields a random product.
gmcm.section.title: Mystery Harvest Crop
gmcm.section.desc: Choose which categories the mystery harvest can include.
gmcm.includeFruits.name: Include fruit
gmcm.includeFruits.desc: Allow harvested items to be fruit.
gmcm.includeVegetables.name: Include vegetables
gmcm.includeVegetables.desc: Allow harvested items to be vegetables.
gmcm.includeAnimalProducts.name: Include animal products
gmcm.includeAnimalProducts.desc: Allow harvested items to be animal products and artisan goods derived from them.
gmcm.includeFlowers.name: Include flowers
gmcm.includeFlowers.desc: Allow harvested items to be flowers.
